step.description: Specify a client as a client name.
An existing config, but for the wrong SCM.
dest contains a path with spaces.
dest contains a path with spaces.
See NMB-10454. The plugin checks out the entire depot when the template is bogus.
"updates File:" is not blank. See NMB-10456. The p4 client is using the default port, 1666, instead of the defined port.

step.command: ectool getProperty $[test] > test.preflight export P4CLIENT=scmtest ecclientpreflight.exe --config test.preflight --debug 1

formalParameter.description: The resource on which to run this test
